20110120151428.000|20110120151429.000|CC1|TO YOU.

20110120155410.000|20110120155411.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.

20110120155411.000|20110120155414.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110120155414.000|20110120155414.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110120155414.000|20110120155416.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110120155416.000|20110120155416.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110120155416.000|20110120155420.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110120155420.000|20110120155420.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110120155420.000|20110120155420.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110120155420.000|20110120155423.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110120155423.000|20110120155423.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110120155423.000|20110120155425.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110120155425.000|20110120155425.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110120155425.000|20110120155428.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110120155428.000|20110120155428.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110120155428.000|20110120155431.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110120155431.000|20110120155431.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain

20110120155432.000|20110120155435.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.

20110120155435.000|20110120155437.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110120155437.000|20110120155437.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110120155437.000|20110120155441.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110120155441.000|20110120155441.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110120155441.000|20110120155442.000|CC1|           medicines,

20110120155442.000|20110120155445.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110120155445.000|20110120155446.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110120155446.000|20110120155446.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110120155446.000|20110120155448.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.

20110120155448.000|20110120155451.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,
